ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client has history of severe allergic reactions'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Meningococcal vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" (where "Type of meningococcal dose" = "Polysaccharide vaccine") = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" (where "Type of meningococcal dose" = "Polysaccharide vaccine") = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Meningococcalcontraindications * Tabs: Meningococcal
Do not vaccinate client with meningococcal if client has history of severe allergic reaction to any component of the meningococcal vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with meningococcal if client has history of severe allergic reaction to any component of the meningococcal vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with meningococcal if client has history of severe allergic reaction to any component of the meningococcal vaccine. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Meningococcalcontraindications * Tabs: Meningococcal
